title: Always keep reporting `Already in CPU Profiling`
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
v7.5.2

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

![img_v3_02cf_2a47982b-640a-46c7-a49c-769ff40ab27g](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/assets/13497871/9653e929-a855-4af8-8e65-1ce0dc14272f)

comments_data.body: I've seen the same message in v7.5.4; we need to cherry-pick the fix for the CPU profile to work.
